author: Ramnah
text:
"You" were there for me at all times 
I, a fool, believed u left me for lifetime

I was a ignoramus, but u enlighten me in hard times
I'm grateful I found "You" just in "time"

~Ramnah~

author: Ramnah
text:
I pelt onto the ground , livin' agonizing
I can't help but to think it's tramautizing

I have no one except "You" I'm "realising"
I did worse but "You" are the most forgiving

I sensed ,in the deep dark sea "I was drowning"
I look around ,saw no one now I'm grasping 
......

author: Ramnah
text:
will u be my cure to the disease?
Do I look strong or Am I weak?

As u r beside me in my need
I'm blessed as before You I "kneel"

 No one is like You I feel
You are the only saviour from ordeal

I'm stuck in my past , feelin' guilt
Relivin' unnecessary drama ,I wilt
Continue...
